title: Pia Miller shows off her sensational figure in a slip dress and pearl necklace on a Greek island
text:
She's the former Home and Away actress known for her stunning face.

And on Tuesday, Pia Miller showed of her sensational figure in a white slip dress and a long pearl necklace during a trip to the Greek island of Kastellorizo.

Taking to Instagram, the brunette beauty, 35, shared a picture of herself lounging on a bed in a hotel room during a video shoot for Paspaley Pearls.

'Living the dream': Pia Miller (pictured) showed off her sensational figure in a slip dress and long pearl necklace during a photoshoot on a Greek island on Tuesday

'When you have a vision for your life... Lounging around in Europe in Silk & Pearls... Magic! Paspaley Pearls living the dream,' Pia captioned the post.

The model wore a variety of pearl necklaces and summery outfits in a cinematic promotional video for the jewellery brand last month.

In the clip, Pia gracefully danced around the picturesque seaside town before pirouetting in front of Greek locals in a public square.

The stunning beauty gushed over the experience on Instagram.

'I loved everything about this shoot. The people, the locals , our team, the island, the music, the magic, the freedom. I am so excited to share it with you!' Pia wrote.

Pia has been to Europe several times this year,

In August, she was seen enjoying an Italian getaway on a luxury yacht with her boyfriend Patrick Whitesell, 54.

It was revealed the actress and model was dating the Hollywood agent following her split with fiance Tyson Mullane in April.

According to a report by Page Six, Pia started dating the Hollywood power player in May, and the pair enjoyed a romantic trip to Paris in June.

Patrick runs WME talent agency, the powerhouse company behind A-list stars including Matt Damon, Christian Bale and Hugh Jackman.
